titles.title: Jobs and Opportunity with Benefits and Services for Success Act
A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.
Jobs and Opportunity with Benefits and Services for Success Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Jobs and Opportunity with Benefits and Services for Success Act
This bill modifies requirements related to the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program, including by establishing stricter work requirements for beneficiaries and requiring states to measure work outcomes. The bill also extends various TANF grant programs through FY2023.
